sellerCard.oneLiner: We are here to help, Don't waste your time and money looking elsewhere
sellerCard.description:
Hi
With over nine years of professional experience in web development and design, we have established ourselves as skilled and reliable experts in the field. Our diverse portfolio showcases successful collaborations with a wide range of clients, each with unique requirements and challenges. From small startups to established businesses, we have consistently provided tailored web solutions that meet our clients’ specific needs. Not only do we excel in technical skills, but we also prioritize user experience (UX) and design principles. We are available 24/7 to address any queries related to web.

description.content:
Do you want a high quality WordPress website that can make your business standout from others, increase your business value and sales Don't worry you are at right place. With 8+ years experience, 1000+ happy customers on Fiverr & excellent reviews I would be your trusted developer. 

 

What you will receive:

 # Responsive (Desktop, Tablets & Smart Phones)

 # Sliders & Animations

 # Fully Secure with security plugins and website monitoring

 # Social Media Integration

# Smart Navigation

 # SEO Ready for better search results in Google

 # Contact Forms, Google Maps Integration

 # Newsletter & Options Integration (Inline, Popups)

 # Elementor, WPBakery compatible for easy editing

 # Complete Backups

 # Unlimited Revisions, Ongoing Support

 # Google Analytics & Facebook pixel integration

 # No Coding Knowledge Required

 

Which Types of Websites I develop/design:  

# Personal or Brand

# Ecommerce

# Business & Enterprise

# Digital Agencies

# Photography

# Authors or Publishers

# Health & Fitness

# Education

# Real Estate

 

Please contact me first before placing any order. So we will able to avoid order cancellation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do i require before placing order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You would need to have Hosting or WordPress Login Content or text that will go on each page of website Ecommerce> Product images with prices If you do not have content then no problem i can setup the site using dummy data which can be easily replaced with original text.

questionsAndAnswers.question: After website is complete what services you will provide?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will provide complete assistance and future changes without any cost. I would be available instantly once you message me with any changes or updates you want so i can do that.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Would you give me login so i can manage website myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes you would be able to manage website yourself. I will provide you complete backend access that will allow you to manage your website easily. I will also provide you basic wordpress tutorials on how to update your website easily.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If i need a website similar to other site what should i do?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: For that just provide me that website url that you want to make your site similar i will check it and let you know more details.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide seo services as part of website development/design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes all websites i do are seo optimized. I will do various seo tasks to boost your website seo score.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I do not have the content for the website, can we start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will add dummy content so that you would be able to replace that with your own content in the future. The content will be dummy "Lorum Ipsum" and will not be relevant to any industry.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Even if you don't know any programming language, You can easily edit your website. This is the power of WordPress. After watching a few tutorials, you can change anything. I will send the tutorial at the end.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide domain and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I am not providing but I can suggest and recommend you the best hosting service providers.

reviews.comment: exceptional work, went beyond expected. must recommend

I gave him full details to prepare a website from the very beggining; it extended the delivery time and I had to chase for EVERYTHING; the website that he “designed” is not useful (really old style, basic and ugly) I need to pay to someone else to make it a useful website for my customers; also some of the requests has not been included. He does not have any gut as designer, and I didn't felt that the interaction was professional at all; It took me a lot of hours and effort to chase and give clear instructions, and I dont like the result.

seller_response.comment:
Hi

I did all the task according to your provided google sheet, but you telling you not satisfied?

I changed also few things by discussing with you, if you had any issue of course you can share with me, but at the end you not happy with my work and giving me bad feedback this is not good for me as a responsible person,

my duty was to see you as a happy person, but you not happy, this is not good,

why you not shared with me your issue?
